org.springframework.data.gemfire.search.lucene.support

Class ProjectingLuceneOperationsSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.gemfire.search.lucene.support.LuceneOperationsSupport
      • org.springframework.data.gemfire.search.lucene.support.ProjectingLuceneOperationsSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LuceneOperations, ProjectingLuceneOperations
    Deprecated. 
    To be removed in GemFire 10 integration

    public abstract class ProjectingLuceneOperationsSupport
extends LuceneOperationsSupport
implements ProjectingLuceneOperations
    ProjectingLuceneOperationsSupport is a abstract supporting class for implementations of the ProjectingLuceneOperations interface.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    See Also:
    ProjectingLuceneOperations

    • Method Detail

      • query

        public <T> java.util.List<T> query(java.lang.String query,
                                   java.lang.String defaultField,
                                   int resultLimit,
                                   java.lang.Class<T> projectionType)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: ProjectingLuceneOperations
        Executes the given query with the limited results projected as instances of the projectionType.
        Specified by:
        query in interface ProjectingLuceneOperations
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type of the projection.
        Parameters:
        query - Lucene query to execute.
        defaultField - String specifying the default field used in Lucene queries when a field is not explicitly defined in the Lucene query clause.
        resultLimit - limit on the number of query results to return.
        projectionType - Class type of the individual elements in the query results.
        Returns:
        a List of Lucene query results projected as instances of projectionType.
        See Also:
        ProjectingLuceneOperations.query(String, String, int, Class), List

      • query

        public <T> org.springframework.data.domain.Page<T> query(java.lang.String query,
                                                         java.lang.String defaultField,
                                                         int resultLimit,
                                                         int pageSize,
                                                         java.lang.Class<T> projectionType)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: ProjectingLuceneOperations
        Executes the given query with the limited results projected as instances of the projectionType.
        Specified by:
        query in interface ProjectingLuceneOperations
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type of the projection.
        Parameters:
        query - Lucene query to execute.
        defaultField - String specifying the default field used in Lucene queries when a field is not explicitly defined in the Lucene query clause.
        resultLimit - limit on the number of query results to return.
        pageSize - number of results on a Page.
        projectionType - Class type of the individual elements in the query results.
        Returns:
        the first Page of results returned from the Lucene query.
        See Also:
        Page
